Text: Warning: PPC Only - will install but will not work on Intel machines.

I have Intel 10.5 Leopard, and it official does NOT work on Intel Macs with QT7

There are 2 versions with 2 different sizes.  The 716k size is ONLY for PPC and will NOT under any circumstances work on Intel.  After install, Quicktime, MPEG Streamclip and any other software that uses it will not recognize it.  

The 2nd one is 868k and will work on both PPC and Intel.  That is the one you want, and I should have it posted soon.

Do NOT download this if you have Intel mac as it will NOT work.

Someone beat me to the upload I guess, because I couldn't find it before, but here is the link to the newer Component that works with Intel macs on QT versions 6 and 7.

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3951087/QuickTimeMPEG2.dmg
This is working on my Intel mac running Leopard 10.5.1 and QuickTime 7.4. Thanks!
It's pathetic that Apple charges for a file that could fit on a 3.5" disk. Thank you for the upload.
